If you are looking for Government Sponsorship Scholarship in Mexico, the Mexican Excellence Scholarships for Foreigners opportunity is here. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs (SRE) and the Mexican Agency for International Development Cooperation (AMEXCID) are delighted to announce the availability of the Government of Mexico Excellence Scholarships 2024. This prestigious scholarship program aims to provide international students with the opportunity to pursue their undergraduate, masters, and PhD studies in Mexico.

The Government scholarship will be available for students to undertake their studies at eligible higher education institutions across Mexico. By offering these scholarships, Mexico endeavors to foster strong bilateral relationships with more than 180 countries worldwide, thereby promoting global cooperation and academic exchange.

Scholarship Sponsor(s): Government of Mexico

Scholarship Type: Full Funding

Host Institution(s): Not specified

Scholarship Worth: Not specified

Application Deadline: July 21, 2024

Number of Awards: Several

Study Level: Undergraduate and Postgraduate

Nationality: International students

About the Government of Mexico Excellence Scholarships

To contribute to the development of high-level academic human capital by granting scholarships for full-time, in-person training programs in Mexico at the Master’s and Doctoral levels, student mobility at the undergraduate and Master’s levels, as well as postgraduate stays.

Eligibility Criteria for the Mexican Excellence Scholarships for Foreigners.

To be considered for the Government of Mexico Excellence Scholarships 2024, applicants must meet one of the following requirements:

  • Applicants must demonstrate the willingness to commit to full time studies at eligible higher education institutions in Mexico.
  • Applicants must have obtained relevant academic qualifications before applying for the scholarship.
  • Applicants must demonstrate excellent academic and research abilities.
  • Be willing to abide by the rules and regulations governing the conduct of students in Mexico.

Scholarship Benefits

  • Full enrollment and tuition cover
  • Monthly stipend ($ 12,614.80 pesos for masters and $15,768.50 pesos for doctoral scholarships).
  • Medical insurance
  • Payment waiver for issuing Mexican visa
  • International air fight on completion of studies

Application Procedures

How-to-Apply: Interested applicants for the Government of Mexico Excellence Scholarships for Foreigners 2024 are to complete an electronic application through the academic Cooperation Management System (SIGCA) application portal.

Document Requirements

  • All academic documents relating to the studies or research
  • Copy of a valid passport showing the applicant’s identification information.
  • Signed declaration letter
  • Curriculum vitae
  • Copy of a medical certificate issued by a public or private healthcare institution.

Visit the Official Website for Further Details
